content.text: Bridal Aisle Dress Appointment
content.html: Bridal Aisle Dress Appointment

content.text: Appt. fee | $25.00 (applied to dress sale when purchased the same day as the appointment)
content.html: Appt. fee | $25.00 (applied to dress sale when purchased the same day as the appointment)

content.text: The bride will have access to all dresses in the store including the Budget Bridal Outlet to try on. This appointment type is recommended for brides with a budget higher than $700. All dresses range from $350 - $2,500.
content.html:
The bride will have access to all dresses in the store including the Budget Bridal Outlet to try on. This appointment type is recommended for brides with a budget higher than $700.

All dresses range from $350 - $2,500.

content.text: The Bride + 4 guests will enjoy a 90-minute bridal appointment with a personal stylist to assist you in finding ‘the one’! While your guests relax in their designated seating area, your expert stylist will guide you in selecting and trying on dresses that suit your style, body shape, and wedding vision.
content.html: The Bride + 4 guests will enjoy a 90-minute bridal appointment with a personal stylist to assist you in finding ‘the one’! While your guests relax in their designated seating area, your expert stylist will guide you in selecting and trying on dresses that suit your style, body shape, and wedding vision.

content.text:

up to 4 guests

content.text: Budget Bridal Outlet Dress Appointment
content.html: Budget Bridal Outlet Dress Appointment

content.text: Appt. fee | $25.00 (applied to dress sale when purchased the same day as the appointment)
content.html: Appt. fee | $25.00 (applied to dress sale when purchased the same day as the appointment)

content.text: The bride will have access to only our Budget Bridal Dresses during their 60-minute appointment.
content.html: The bride will have access to only our Budget Bridal Dresses during their 60-minute appointment.

content.text: The Bride + 4 guests will enjoy a 60-minute bridal appointment in our Budget Bridal Outlet section of the store where all dresses are priced $600 or less. While your guests relax in their designated seating area, your personal stylist will guide you in selecting and trying on dresses that suit your style, budget, body shape, and wedding vision.
content.html: The Bride + 4 guests will enjoy a 60-minute bridal appointment in our Budget Bridal Outlet section of the store where all dresses are priced $600 or less. While your guests relax in their designated seating area, your personal stylist will guide you in selecting and trying on dresses that suit your style, budget, body shape, and wedding vision.

content.text: VIP Bridal Experience
content.html: VIP Bridal Experience

content.text: Appt. fee | $100 (applied to dress sale when purchased the same day as the appointment)
content.html: Appt. fee | $100 (applied to dress sale when purchased the same day as the appointment)

content.text: All dresses range from $350.00 - $2,500.
content.html: All dresses range from $350.00 - $2,500.

content.text: The Bride and up to 10 guests will enjoy a 90-minute bridal appointment with one of our senior stylists to assist you in finding ‘the one’! While your guests relax in their semi-private designated seating area, your expert stylist will guide you in selecting and trying on dresses that suit your style, body shape, and wedding vision.
content.html: The Bride and up to 10 guests will enjoy a 90-minute bridal appointment with one of our senior stylists to assist you in finding ‘the one’! While your guests relax in their semi-private designated seating area, your expert stylist will guide you in selecting and trying on dresses that suit your style, body shape, and wedding vision.

content.text:
VIP appointments are booked by phone only. Call us to reserve.
$100 Appointment fee
up to 10 guests
90 minutes with a senior bridal stylist

content.text: Accessory/Bridal Styling Appointment
content.html: Accessory/Bridal Styling Appointment

content.text: We charge a $25 cancellation fee if not cancelled at least 48 hours before appointment
content.html: We charge a $25 cancellation fee if not cancelled at least 48 hours before appointment

content.text: You found your perfect dress, now it's time to accessorize!This appointment is a 60-minute one-on-one consultation with a trained stylist to show you the perfect pairing of a veil or belt (& more) with your wedding dress!Feel free to bring in your dress to get the full effect and see how the accessories complement one another.
content.html:
You found your perfect dress, now it's time to accessorize!

This appointment is a 60-minute one-on-one consultation with a trained stylist to show you the perfect pairing of a veil or belt (& more) with your wedding dress!

Feel free to bring in your dress to get the full effect and see how the accessories complement one another.

content.text:
60-minutes with a bridal stylist
bring your dress (optional)
$25 cancellation fee
content.html:
• 60-minutes with a bridal stylist
  • bring your dress (optional)
  • $25 cancellation fee

content.text: The Wood's Men's Suits
content.html: The Wood's Men's Suits

content.text: We carry suits for rental or for purchase.During your 60 Minute appointment, you will have a designated stylist to assist you in selecting the perfect color and style for your wedding or event.It is suggested that the couple come in separate from their party members to make their selections. Once the styles are selected, party members are encouraged to make an appointment to get professionally measured with us and we will get your suits ordered!All orders and measurements must be provided a month prior to the event date to guarantee you suit rentals or two months prior to the event to guarantee suits for purchase.
content.html:
We carry suits for rental or for purchase.
During your 60 Minute appointment, you will have a designated stylist to assist you in selecting the perfect color and style for your wedding or event.

It is suggested that the couple come in separate from their party members to make their selections. Once the styles are selected, party members are encouraged to make an appointment to get professionally measured with us and we will get your suits ordered!

All orders and measurements must be provided a month prior to the event date to guarantee you suit rentals or two months prior to the event to guarantee suits for purchase.

content.text:
No Appointment Fee
60 Minutes with a bridal stylist
content.html:
• No Appointment Fee
  • 60 Minutes with a bridal stylist

content.text: How to Prepare for your Appointment
content.html: How to Prepare for your Appointment

content.text: We’re a shoe-free boutique to keep our gowns pristine
content.html: We’re a shoe-free boutique to keep our gowns pristine

content.text: To protect our dresses from Minnesota’s unpredictable weather, we kindly ask all guests to remove their shoes upon arrival. We’ll provide slippers for you to wear during your appointment, or you may bring your own.
content.html: To protect our dresses from Minnesota’s unpredictable weather, we kindly ask all guests to remove their shoes upon arrival. We’ll provide slippers for you to wear during your appointment, or you may bring your own.

content.text: A smaller guest list makes for a more meaningful moment
content.html: A smaller guest list makes for a more meaningful moment

content.text: Finding your dress is a once-in-a-lifetime moment, and bringing just one or two trusted guests allows you to truly focus on what you love. For groups larger than four, please contact us to book a private appointment for a more comfortable experience.
content.html: Finding your dress is a once-in-a-lifetime moment, and bringing just one or two trusted guests allows you to truly focus on what you love. For groups larger than four, please contact us to book a private appointment for a more comfortable experience.

content.text: Arriving on time ensures you get the full experience
content.html: Arriving on time ensures you get the full experience

content.text: We encourage brides to arrive on time, or a few minutes early, so we can provide the attentive and relaxed experience every appointment deserves. If you anticipate being late, please let us know so we can accommodate you with care.
content.html: We encourage brides to arrive on time, or a few minutes early, so we can provide the attentive and relaxed experience every appointment deserves. If you anticipate being late, please let us know so we can accommodate you with care.

content.text: The earlier you shop, the easier your alterations will be
content.html: The earlier you shop, the easier your alterations will be

content.text: Your perfect dress deserves the perfect fit. Shopping well in advance of your wedding date ensures you have time for any necessary alterations. If you don’t have an alteration specialist, our team would love to recommend one.
content.html: Your perfect dress deserves the perfect fit. Shopping well in advance of your wedding date ensures you have time for any necessary alterations. If you don’t have an alteration specialist, our team would love to recommend one.

content.text: The right undergarments make all the difference
content.html: The right undergarments make all the difference

content.text: Your undergarments create the foundation for your overall look. We recommend nude, seamless pieces and a strapless or convertible bra — or even going braless if you feel comfortable. Most gowns include built-in cups, so skipping a bra often gives you the most accurate fit and feel.
content.html: Your undergarments create the foundation for your overall look. We recommend nude, seamless pieces and a strapless or convertible bra — or even going braless if you feel comfortable. Most gowns include built-in cups, so skipping a bra often gives you the most accurate fit and feel.

content.text: If you need to cancel, please let us know in advance
content.html: If you need to cancel, please let us know in advance

content.text: We require a minimum of 24 hours’ notice to receive a refund of your $25 deposit. Arriving more than 20 minutes late without notice will result in cancellation. The deposit is non-refundable if you do not cancel in advance or if you do not find your gown during your visit.
content.html: We require a minimum of 24 hours’ notice to receive a refund of your $25 deposit. Arriving more than 20 minutes late without notice will result in cancellation. The deposit is non-refundable if you do not cancel in advance or if you do not find your gown during your visit.

content.text: Our food & beverage policy
content.html: Our food & beverage policy

content.text: To maintain the beauty and cleanliness of our gowns and boutique, we kindly ask that no food or beverages are brought into the store. Clear liquids and champagne are welcome; however, we ask that champagne be opened outdoors or in the restroom area. All other beverages may be left in the front waiting area.
content.html: To maintain the beauty and cleanliness of our gowns and boutique, we kindly ask that no food or beverages are brought into the store. Clear liquids and champagne are welcome; however, we ask that champagne be opened outdoors or in the restroom area. All other beverages may be left in the front waiting area.

content.text: We kindly ask that appointments remain adult-only
content.html: We kindly ask that appointments remain adult-only

content.text: We adore children, but to ensure a calm and focused experience for every bride, we ask that appointments remain adult-only. This allows us to give you—and every guest in the boutique—the pampered attention you deserve.
content.html: We adore children, but to ensure a calm and focused experience for every bride, we ask that appointments remain adult-only. This allows us to give you—and every guest in the boutique—the pampered attention you deserve.

content.text: Danielle laveau
content.html: Danielle laveau

content.text: “I had a fantastic experience at Bridal Aisle. Kendra was so knowledgeable and helpful and made it her mission to help me narrow down some options. And there are SO MANY OPTIONS. Especially if you're a size 12. It was almost overwhelming. So many dresses were gorgeous and I could barely make up my mind. And the prices weren't bad at all in comparison to some other stores I visited. I was expecting to pay so much more for the dress and came away beyond pleased with my pick.”
content.html: “I had a fantastic experience at Bridal Aisle. Kendra was so knowledgeable and helpful and made it her mission to help me narrow down some options. And there are SO MANY OPTIONS. Especially if you're a size 12. It was almost overwhelming. So many dresses were gorgeous and I could barely make up my mind. And the prices weren't bad at all in comparison to some other stores I visited. I was expecting to pay so much more for the dress and came away beyond pleased with my pick.”

content.text: I came away beyond pleased with my pick
content.html: I came away beyond pleased with my pick

content.text: CAITLIN MOSLEY, BRIDAL BOUTIQUE VIP APPOINTMENT
content.html: CAITLIN MOSLEY, BRIDAL BOUTIQUE VIP APPOINTMENT

content.text: "Alex was my consultant & I just want to say how amazing she was! She made this experience smooth & seamless, I instantly felt comfortable with her & she was extremely helpful through the entire process! I absolutely loved the privacy & how we felt as if we had the whole shop to ourselves! It made the experience so much more intimate & special. I found a dress that exceeded my expectations & I could not be happier!”
content.html: "Alex was my consultant & I just want to say how amazing she was! She made this experience smooth & seamless, I instantly felt comfortable with her & she was extremely helpful through the entire process! I absolutely loved the privacy & how we felt as if we had the whole shop to ourselves! It made the experience so much more intimate & special. I found a dress that exceeded my expectations & I could not be happier!”

content.text: I found a dress that exceeded my expectations & I could not be happier!
content.html: I found a dress that exceeded my expectations & I could not be happier!

content.text: “I couldn't recommend Bridal Aisle enough. Bought my dress a little over a year ago and just got married! Loved being able to walk around and look at style of dresses and pick, not someone picking for me.”
content.html: “I couldn't recommend Bridal Aisle enough. Bought my dress a little over a year ago and just got married! Loved being able to walk around and look at style of dresses and pick, not someone picking for me.”

content.text: I couldn't recommend Bridal Aisle enough!
content.html: I couldn't recommend Bridal Aisle enough!

content.text: MADDY AHNER
content.html: MADDY AHNER

content.text: HANNAH DAVIS
content.html: HANNAH DAVIS

content.text: "Is there a way I can add more than 5 stars? Because this place deserves it!! Not only are the owners and employees EXTREMELY friendly and helpful, but they also listened to what my vision was and then made it come to life significantly under my budget. I loved that they let me look around first to show them what I wanted and that almost all of the dresses I would get to take home that day, which is exactly what I did. Found the dress of my dreams for only $800 and I will recommend this place to everyone looking for formal attire."
content.html: "Is there a way I can add more than 5 stars? Because this place deserves it!! Not only are the owners and employees EXTREMELY friendly and helpful, but they also listened to what my vision was and then made it come to life significantly under my budget. I loved that they let me look around first to show them what I wanted and that almost all of the dresses I would get to take home that day, which is exactly what I did. Found the dress of my dreams for only $800 and I will recommend this place to everyone looking for formal attire."

content.text: Jessica Motzko
content.html: Jessica Motzko

content.text: “BEST experience ever! Stacy was great! She was super attentive to my dress dreams, my budget, and me/my bridal party. I said YES to the dress and couldn’t be happier! Thank you Stacy and Bridal Aisle for making this experience so special, not only me but my bridal party as well!”
content.html: “BEST experience ever! Stacy was great! She was super attentive to my dress dreams, my budget, and me/my bridal party. I said YES to the dress and couldn’t be happier! Thank you Stacy and Bridal Aisle for making this experience so special, not only me but my bridal party as well!”

content.text: Do I need to set up an appointment to try on wedding dresses?
content.html: Do I need to set up an appointment to try on wedding dresses?

content.text: Yes. We require all brides to book appointments. Don’t hesitate to make your appointment as we book up well in advance. Appointments allow us to provide you and your party with the attention and experience you deserve.
content.html: Yes. We require all brides to book appointments. Don’t hesitate to make your appointment as we book up well in advance. Appointments allow us to provide you and your party with the attention and experience you deserve.

content.text: FAQ
content.html: FAQ

content.text: Why do you charge for bridal appointments?
content.html: Why do you charge for bridal appointments?

content.text: During your bridal appointment, you are guaranteed one-on-one attention with a dedicated stylist to guide and assist with your selection, and the exclusive use of an area in the boutique. Our bridal gown appointments are 90 minutes for brides who are ready to take their dream dress home!
content.html: During your bridal appointment, you are guaranteed one-on-one attention with a dedicated stylist to guide and assist with your selection, and the exclusive use of an area in the boutique. Our bridal gown appointments are 90 minutes for brides who are ready to take their dream dress home!

content.text: If I find a wedding dress but want to come back with a friend the next day, how long could you hold my dress until I return to the shop?
content.html: If I find a wedding dress but want to come back with a friend the next day, how long could you hold my dress until I return to the shop?

content.text: We can hold your dresses for 24 hours for a non-refundable $50. The $50 will be applied to the purchase of your dress.If you do not purchase your dress within the 24 hour period, the $50 will be retained and the dress will be returned to the floor. This ensures we give every bride the best opportunity to find the dress of her dreams!
content.html:
We can hold your dresses for 24 hours for a non-refundable $50. The $50 will be applied to the purchase of your dress.

If you do not purchase your dress within the 24 hour period, the $50 will be retained and the dress will be returned to the floor. This ensures we give every bride the best opportunity to find the dress of her dreams!

content.text: We are excited to carry over 2,000 new wedding gowns for you to bring home today. Visit our Instagram or Facebook page for the most updated look at our newest arrivals.As a one-stop shop you will also find, mothers dresses, formal dresses and suits at Bridal Aisle Boutique.
content.html:
We are excited to carry over 2,000 new wedding gowns for you to bring home today. Visit our Instagram or Facebook page for the most updated look at our newest arrivals.

As a one-stop shop you will also find, mothers dresses, formal dresses and suits at Bridal Aisle Boutique.

content.text: We do not allow drinks or food within the store. Champagne and clear liquids are acceptable but all other substances will be asked to be left in our front waiting area. Champagne must be popped either in our restroom or outside.

content.text: We can hold your dresses for 24 hours for a non-refundable $50. The $50 will be applied to the purchase of your dress.If you do not purchase your dress within the 24 hour period, the $50 will be retained and the dress will be returned to the floor. This ensures we give every bride the best opportunity to find the dress of her dreams!
content.html:
We can hold your dresses for 24 hours for a non-refundable $50. The $50 will be applied to the purchase of your dress.

If you do not purchase your dress within the 24 hour period, the $50 will be retained and the dress will be returned to the floor. This ensures we give every bride the best opportunity to find the dress of her dreams!

content.text: We are excited to carry over 2,000 new wedding gowns for you to bring home today. Visit our Instagram or Facebook page for the most updated look at our newest arrivals.As a one-stop shop you will also find, mothers dresses, formal dresses and tuxes at Bridal Aisle Boutique.
content.html:
We are excited to carry over 2,000 new wedding gowns for you to bring home today. Visit our Instagram or Facebook page for the most updated look at our newest arrivals.

As a one-stop shop you will also find, mothers dresses, formal dresses and tuxes at Bridal Aisle Boutique.

content.text: We do not allow drinks or food within the store. Champagne and clear liquids are acceptable but all other substances will be asked to be left in our front waiting area. Champagne must be popped either in our restroom or outside.
